name: Disco Atlas
description:
The Earth is flat, and you're the one that carries it's weight! Can you guide it to safety?

You're Atlas - the great mythological titan, who bears the world upon his shoulders. Carry the Flat Earth through the dangers - you'll be fine, you're an immortal being - or throw it like Discobolus to solve puzzles!

Game was developed in the Game Maker 2 Engine
